org.jooby.cassandra

Class Datastore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.cassandra.Datastore

  • public class Datastore
extends Object

    datastore

    Provides basic crud operations, like a Mapper without requiring an instance per each entity class.

    Since:
    1.0.0.CR7
    Author:
    edgar
